summary: Created AlgebraicSemanticBridge.lean with type infrastructure connecting ultrafilters to TaskModel/WorldHistory. Propositional cases of truth lemma complete (atom, bot, imp forward). Modal and temporal cases have sorries due to box requiring reasoning about all ultrafilters, not just one.

artifacts.summary: New file: algebraic semantic bridge with task frame, model, and partial truth lemma
Implementation summary documenting partial completion and technical insights

completion_data.completion_summary: Created algebraic semantic bridge infrastructure connecting ultrafilters to standard Kripke semantics. Type infrastructure complete (algTaskFrame, algModel, algHistory). Truth lemma complete for propositional fragment (atom, bot, imp forward). Modal/temporal cases have sorries due to fundamental challenge: box semantics require reasoning about all ultrafilters simultaneously.
